name: WorkingSet based, customizable VM Linux
short_description: Patch to Linux kernel, which makes the virtual memory system use working set page replacement algorithm. It will also allow restriction of how much RAM a process can use and also a guarantee of a minumum of RAM that will never get swapped out.
